description:
Perhaps your most valuable piece of gear when traveling in buggy areas, this head net keeps you protected without obscuring your vision.

  • Made of 15-denier black mesh that is easy to see through
  • Ultra-fine, 310 hole/sq.cm. mesh keeps out small insects like no-see-ums and midges
  • Elasticized drawcord closure seals the opening
name: Sea To Summit Ultra-Fine Mesh Headnet
